S:log-item.D:comment: Update some ANT plugins: - make SVN version configurable: As svnkit 1.8 does not support svn 1.7 WCs and vice versa, if you use an 1.8 WC, you have to manually pass -Dsvnkit.version=1.8.0 (unless I find a better solution...) - Update Groovy - Update Pegdown - LUCENE-5243: Update Clover to released version 3.2.0 (no more snapshot)
